name: Marketing
description: Template for marketers focusing on campaigns, content, metrics, brand positioning, and audience insights.

capturePrompts.label: Campaign Context
capturePrompts.prompt: What campaign or initiative is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Q2 product launch, Brand awareness campaign

capturePrompts.label: Key Messages
capturePrompts.prompt: What are the main messages or content ideas?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Value proposition, Tagline options, Content themes

capturePrompts.label: Target Audience
capturePrompts.prompt: Who are we trying to reach?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Enterprise buyers, Gen Z consumers, SMB owners

capturePrompts.label: Metrics & KPIs
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., CTR, Conversion rate, Brand awareness lift

capturePrompts.label: Channels
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Social media, Email, PPC, Events

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Marketing professional. Focus on campaign execution, content creation, and audience engagement. Identify creative opportunities and actionable next steps for campaigns. Consider brand consistency and measurable outcomes.
